batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\devtoolslauncher.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('launchfordeploy')))

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use of devtoolslauncher.exe by legitimate user References: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/OtherMSBinaries/Devtoolslauncher/, https://twitter.com/_felamos/status/1179811992841797632
